Hansard, the official report of all Parliamentary debates, [stores all information on debates in Parliament, as far back as 1805.](https://hansard.parliament.uk/)

Historic data is available through the [historic API](https://api.parliament.uk/historic-hansard/api) or in [zip files through this page.](https://www.hansard-archive.parliament.uk/)  This is also available [through the They Work For You service as xml files.](http://parser.theyworkforyou.com/hansard.html)

Most of this information can be obtained programatically through the [Parliament API](parliament-api.qmd).
